job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: pRelay is seeking a midlevel Software Engineer to help build our next generation of software and services Havent heard of Relay You will soon We are changing the way active workers communicate and our tightknit team is looking to add another Software Engineer that is excited to drive impact Check out our product here httpsrelaygocomppbrppThis role involves developing Java web applications with Amazon Web Services that power our backend systemsnbspWe build APIs internal applications integrate with 3rd party providers for things like billing logistics customer service and own a data warehouseppbrppThe ideal candidate will have experience as a Software Engineer in a fastpaced environment that has a strong emphasis on team culturenbspOur current team of missionfocused individuals feels like familynbspIn addition to the technical skills needed to get the job done as a candidate you will be able to work closely with team members across the business in order to develop innovative solutions which grow the brand nbspppbrppstrongEssential FunctionsstrongpulliMust be able to work in close coordination with other engineers to implement new software solutionsliliAnalyze requirements and specifications to determine the feasibility of proposed projects and solutions including risk assessment of current production systems and project estimationliliParticipate in the teams software development processliliDevelop unit and functionalintegration testsliliSupport production deployments of developed solutions and ongoing production support via an oncall rotation about once per monthliliStrong communication and problem solving skillsliliDocument solutions for team members and end usersliliHave a strong interest in researching best practices in software development and demonstrate the ability to share new knowledge with the teamnbspliulpstrongRequired SkillsnbspstrongpulliSoftware design skills with a deep understanding of object oriented programming fundamentals and design patternsliliExperience with relational database systemsliliExperience in developing RESTful APIsliliExcellent technical problem solving and debugging skills with asynchronous systemsliliStrong selfmotivation and willingness to tackle challenging problemsliliAbility to multitask work and communicate in a fast paced environmentliliAbility to provide technical mentorship in a team environmentnbspliulpbrppstrongRequired ExperiencestrongppOur stack is a JEE application tightly coupled with Amazon Web Services products and featuresnbspThe ideal candidate will have experience with the followingpulli2 years of current Java experiencelili2 years of handson development with MySQL PostGres or similarlili2 years producing and consuming RESTful web service APIsliliExperience developing asynchronous applications ideally with Amazon SWF or similar technologiesliliExperience with interpreted languages such as Python or PerlliliExperience developing in a LinuxUnix environment using Git or similar versioning systems for source controlliliExperience with Amazon Web Services S3 EC2 RDS SWF SQS Cloudformation or other cloud services Azure Google etc is a plusliul
